description: A utility for updating and trimming Winapp2.ini, a cleaning-routines file for CCleaner and other compatible cleaners
notes: winapp2ool has its own update mechanism, and said updates are not pushed to Releases.
Said mechanism shouldn't cause any issues to use, from what I can tell.
Therefore, I have disabled autoupdate and marked the version 1.4+ as it is on GitHub.
If not existing- a default winapp2.ini is created with save/read "settings from disk" turned on.
If not desired, you can turn this off with menu #7.
